title: Natalie Wood
summary: Natalie Wood (born Natalie Zacharenko,[n 1] Russian: Наталья Николаевна Захаренко, tr. Natalia Nikolaevna Zakharenko; July 20, 1938 – November 29, 1981) was an American actress who began her career in film as a child and successfully transitioned to young adult roles. She was the recipient of four Golden Globes and three Academy Award nominations.
